Iâ€™ve tried two already and I hate the side effects of each, they say I have to give them a chance instead of constantly Changing them. I am going to appeal the section
Thanks but I doubt I will. They force me to take medication that makes me feel like shit.

I often dream of some sort of revoultion or group against not just perps/gangstalking but the powers at large. I have already ruined my life, peoples trust by actually attempting suicide so I wont until I am absolutely sure.

I used to run but stopped because perps cars would rev and speed up like they are going to run me down. thanks for the comment, I apologise,. I have come so far with being healthier mind and body, I used to be so much worse.

You are right, I apologise man. I struggle reading long text but I understand as I think the same. My head just repeats what if what if. True, if some are right about the nature of life then death will be worse.
Sounds cool but wouldn't it be perfect for perps they could all congregate and work together, their targets all in one place.
I didn't I just happened to be walking in the direction of his house, I acted with no suspicion at all.
You have no clue how real this is. You probably enjoy tormenting TIs. Maybe it is your job description.
There is no control. None at all. One person against so many important, powerful beings and people. No chance.
I hope I didn't have to do it. I really don't want to die. But this is the only way to end this torment. I have spent so long trying to make my mind off it but it always gets me in the end.
Not much, just by meaning of being inside my brain once more. As opposed to when I am forced to vacate this earthly brain when attacked by v2k or mind reading.
Ha, you mock you fool you can mock but you'll never understand the torment. It is absolutely real you god damn drongo. Count yourself lucky I wouldn't wish this on anyone.
They would probably run me over
Time Loop
It is very real, I have experienced much of it myself. For me it is not feeling, but fact. Other dimensions, paranormal beings, aliens, all real. Good luck harnessing your power.

Doppelganger or clone for sure. Probably doppelganger if he managed to dissapear out of an inescapable room. Good thing Dennis didn't see the doppelganger because it can mean you die soon if you see your doppelganger.
I've heard of a story of woman who was not treated properly by doctors because they thought she was faking it. So it definitely is possible. I really hope you don't die, the gangstalkers can't win.
you are a true survivor my friend.

They can access everything anyway, just owning a phone or computer and being connected to the internet or phone companies is enough. It is impossible to have privacy these days. Just make sure to put black tape over all cameras
fuck you, you are lucky to not have to deal with this shit.

Did the aliens want to screw your head under the table and open up your skull and eat your brain while you are still alive... They wanted to do that to me. They'd communicate through the news, V2K and even would watch through the eyes of other people and animals. There must be some way out, I don't want to kill myself.
Mate you are so lucky. They treat you like shit and medication is designed to weaken your brain. Agree this universe had much depth.
They already got me then, I didn't realise it was gangstalking at the time. I only found this information recently.
You speak solid truth. V2K is my experience too. Schizophrenia is the convinient excuse for people targeted or who simply take notice of the true nature of the universe. I've never been more awake.
It is hard to just sit with your brain, I usually try and block it out with music. I'll give it ago, anything to improve my next life.
So fucked up that is their goal.
This is usually to further their career when they are indisposed, correct.
Why would I act weird to him I'm no fool. I just made a joke to him and carried on my way. No reason for a normal man to just watch me, I was gone for over ten minutes before coming back.
Wtf. Maybe a vision of the future or a cruel ghost. Or maybe some sort of clone of your mother.

You sound like my parents lol, I'm fine. You probably don't understand but mental illness is likely a fabrication by the ruling elite to keep people from finding the truth and keeping the peace for them. Individuals are seen as insane but as a group they are not. Take storm area 51 for instance, if one person wanted to they'd be called insane but millions wanted to it isn't crazy, because they all wanted too. This is the same phenomenon. Thanks for caring but you should direct your concern to the people currently being tricked into thinking they are crazy. Especially if they are tricked by gangstalking.
I found some local nearby, thanks for the idea.
Maybe so, I'm planning to move soon so hopefully it will have good people about.
Could be true. I've been really trying but my base thoughts are always there. It is like I was born bigoted and I have to work hard to not be.
Interlocutor, OK. I have been trying to do that and rectify my thoughts about others, I have got a bit better with it.
If I see him again I will make it clear I am not one, then his reaction will show if he is one or not . Happy?
Wait that makes sense, the people being cloned probably don't know it. Could be held somewhere with no memory.
Probably, a lot of the ruling elites have some secret underworld knowledge.

That's some bullshit I'm sorry to say. There are higher frequencies some humans connect to, and medication hinders that. On medication my brain is dull, I cant think clearly, can't hold down a job. No thanks.
Why? I only walked past his house

I was diagnosed in the past but I have overcome it somewhat. I am good at telling what is a delusion or not, this is completely real. The fact other people are targeted proves that. This sub wouldn't exist if it were all in my head.

Why would he watch me out of his window and close the curtain when I noticed him then. That is what cements the proof. I'm not saying everyone is a clone, just that they sometimes are replaced by clones.
Sucks, I found this through another sub and thought it was real. Is there a less troll like forum discussing this?
I'm no narcissist. I've already tried talking to people I know, it didn't end up well. Medication is just a tool to suppress brain waves in people connected to higher frequencies.
Sounds good, thanks

You are a troll, OK. Just yesterday an old man spoke to me and said watch out, the cars come by fast, don't want to get run over. Then when I walk back the other way he watches me through his window and starts closing the curtains when I notice him. This is literal proof something is going on here. Probably a threat.

I am saying that

two belly buttons
Sounds cool, my choice would be an alien. The infinite knowledge of the universe (unless you're a dumb alien like humans)

I actually am diagnosed with schizophrenia. I do think there is more to this than just some crazy mentally ill handwave. Sure, medication can help with the symptoms but maybe they are just blocking parts of the brain than can experience other dimensions or planes.

I have experienced glitches in the matrix so I read this sub. If I ever shared my own experiences with glitches or paranormal it is just handwaved away so I don't bother.

Have a more open mind people, that is what this sub is all about.

Me too. If I dissociate and play fun music at the same time you can almost get high off it. I was hearing the voice of a union soldier so I played some civil war music.
